title: Champion

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player each night.
- Challenge someone during the day. They will know they were targeted by the Champion.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The night after you challenged someone, you will have no defense and be forced to attack the person you challenged. However, on that night you will have roleblock, redirect and prevention immunity. You will also be disguised as a role of your choice for the night, your attack tier will be raised by one, and finally, you can select two targets to roleblock besides your target.
- If you challenge a target and successfully kill them, your attack will be permanently raised by a tier.
- If you challenge a target but they survive, they will learn your identity.
- If you're alive while there are only two people in the game, you win and the game immediately ends.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
